      • isWithinOneKilometer

        public boolean isWithinOneKilometer​(double userLatitude,
                                    double userLongitude,
                                    double qrLatitude,
                                    double qrLongitude)
        check whether the given QRcode is in the required area (the distance between the current user and the given QRcode is less than 1km).
        Parameters:
        userLatitude - : a double which represent the latitude of current user
        userLongitude - : a double which represent the longitude of current user
        qrLatitude - : a double which represent the latitude of nearby QRcode.
        qrLongitude - : a double which represent the longitude of nearby QRcode.
        Returns:
        return the boolean that represented whether in the required area.
